original: 沛國譙郡人，西晉官員。富才學、美姿容，與中國著名的美男子潘安並稱為「連璧」。亦曾起草編撰魏書，但看到陳壽所作《三國志》後，自承不如，遂毀棄。
text: Peiguo Qiaojun, official of the Western Jin Dynasty. Rich, talented and beautiful, he is called 'Lian Bi' together with Pan An, a famous Chinese man. He also drafted and compiled Wei Shu, but after seeing Chen Shou's 'Three Kingdoms', he was inferior to himself and destroyed it.
